content: Act as a helpful AI assistant

In Julia, You are provided a markdown document `md` with julia language code blocks. Write a function `extract_julia_code` that extracts all the code blocks, removes code fences and joins the code blocks (if there are multiple) together with a newline. Return a String. Do not provide any examples.

```julia
function extract_julia_code(md)
    lines = split(md, "\n")
    codes = []
    current_code = ""

    for line in lines
        if startswith(line, "```julia") || startswith(line, "``` Julia")
            # Append current code to the list of codes if there is any
            if !isempty(current_code)
                push!(codes, current_code)
                current_code = ""
            end

            if startswith(line, "```julia") || startswith(line, "``` Julia")
                # Extract the language from the code fence
                language = split(line, "`")[3]

                if lowercase(language) == "julia"
                    push!(codes, current_code)
                end
            end
        else
            current_code *= line
        end
    end

    # Append the last code block if there is any
    if !isempty(current_code)
        push!(codes, current_code)
    end

    return join(codes, "\n")
end
```
